properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-tel}యేసు ప్రభుని సంకల్పములు మారవు ఎన్నటికి మహాప్రభావము ఆయనకే యుగయుగముల వరకు{/lang-tel}
{lang-hin}योजनाऍं जो है यिशु की, बदलती न कभी, युग युग एकसा है यीशु, शान यह है उसकी{/lang-hin}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Moshenu erparachukone thana prajalanu vidipimpa Chesenu gaa ghana kaaryamulu vaari maargamulo Throsinanu nadipinchenu vaarini Visugaka thana throva{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kondapai choopina vidhamunane mandiramunu Nilipe aavaranamu nerparachenu ninduga Theravese devuni kaaryamulanu Moshe Sampoornamu chese{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mandira pani antayunu sampoornamu Cheyagane sundaramuga noka meghamu Gudaaramunu kamme mandira manthayu Yehovaa thejassutho ninden{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa vanniyu neeve gadaa amarudavagu Devaa nee vanniyu naa kitchitivi nee Krupanu batti mahima parathunu Ellappudu ihaparamula yandu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parishuddha janamaa paadedamu Kristu prabhuni batti parshuddha devuni Chittamunu neraverchuchu ilalo nirathamu Mahima stuti ghanatha chellinchedamepudu{/lang-eng}
